name: Xenia Media
tag_list: artist, artist-community, investors, artists, arts-community, entertainment-industry, media, hybrid, publishing, book, monetize, online-social-networking-site, san-francisco, social-media, social-networking
overview:
XENIA MEDIA combines emerging and conventional media platforms, creating and managing hybrid concepts for the Internet, mobile and other digital channels, as well as conventional television, film, print and book publishing. The company’s goal is to explore new avenues for storytelling and new ways to package and distribute talent around the globe. XENIA MEDIA is the parent company of both XENIA MEDIA|Publishing and Chewyslist.

XENIA MEDIA|Publishing is a boutique publishing house that tailors and polishes manuscripts for select clients.

Chewyslist centralizes the arts and entertainment community through one social networking site. Chewyslist is a safe, secure, free destination for professionalsâ€”a hub for creatives to collaborate and address their needs with direct access to people, resources and investors.
